body: Fourwos.  I get what you mean, while they tag stories that are clearly not NTR as NTR just because, taggers need to get their heads out of their asses seriously, all this does is make someone read NTR when they didn't want to or ignore a story that isn't NTR because they labeled it as such, causing you to have to read the story to see for yourself..which is why you BLACKLISTED NTR IN THE FIRST PLACE.
Holy shit cant believe theres no warning tag as NTR, I cnt even get hard by reading this shit
i cant believe this is named 純情痴女
Yeah but then they always have NTR tagged next to Moral Degeneration if it applies, many "MD" don't have NTR in them.
maybe they forgot? i mean just having Moral Degeneration already speaks for itself that this contains NTR.

And now their hiding NTR, TAG THIS AS NTR DAMN IT a few stories in this are OBVIOUSLY NTR and the one in the middle that is three chapters is tagged ON IT'S OWN as NTR. You can't c9mplain if you willingly read a NTR yes, but you can complain when the tagger's aren't doing THEIR FUCKING JOB and you run into a NTR despite blacklisting it.
